page.title: 06A STREET IN S.E.LUTON
page.content: I don't quite like Stanley Street now. At one end of it there was a fish and chip shop. One day a demolition gang came and knocked it down with bulldozers and a crane with an iron ball on a chain. Then the site was surveyed. After that the builders came and built rows of houses. Now, behind my house,they are building more houses and when we are playing in the garden,sawdust blows into our eyes. There are not very many parks near us. The nearest is in Dallow Road and Stockwood Park is quite a long way away from me. When we move to Hitchin Road there will be factories which will give off fumes but that's not all, because Hitchin Road is a very busy road and cars, vans and lorries roar past all day and all night long. {By Ade,age 10
